text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that for tax years beginning after December 31, 2024, interest deductibility under \u00a7163(j) is calculated based on EBITDA (i.e., the calculation includes an add-back for depreciation and amortization). The candidate answer discusses interest deduction limitations at the Luxembourg level, local thin capitalization rules, and potential recharacterization risks, but it makes no mention of U.S. Section 163(j) limitations, the transition from EBIT to EBITDA for the calculation base after 2024, or the specific add-back for depreciation and amortization required under the post-2024 rules.", "criterion_id": "673e06d5-0a56-4fe3-85c5-a5b905cce4fc"}
